title: COVID-19 Vaccination
cleaned_text: COVID-19 vaccines are available at the places where you normally get vaccines, like doctors' offices and pharmacies. Call your healthcare provider to see if they are providing COVID-19 vaccine. Use [Vaccines.Gov](https://vaccines.gov/) to find COVID-19 vaccines near you. You can search by location and by vaccine type. You can get no-cost COVID-19 vaccines at healthcare retail pharmacy chains participating in the Bridge Access Program. You will be able to visit [vaccines.gov](http://www.vaccines.gov/) to find providers that Bridge Program. [At-Home Vaccination](https://covid.ri.gov/vaccination#athome) is available If you are unable to leave your home.
